message.body: Like they finally received your sample?
My sample finally started getting processed in the lab
Oh got it lol.. But yea finally! You get updates as they go?
Yeah and now I just get my results in a few weeks
Ok cool! I can't wait! ... Btw I had the medical exam today for the police program. I passed the vision part!
My investigator has to wait until he gets my drug test results back before he can schedule my polygraph. Omg they cut so much hair!! I thought they only take like a stand or two
That's great. I knew you'd pass the vision exam though haha and what did they cut hair for?
Yea.. had to do urine and hair samples. They lifted the top layer of my hair and then cut my hair from the root! And an inch in width!
Urine sample only goes back 30 days. Hair sample can go back years
Woah haha that's crazy. I would've had a big reaction
I did! Literally eyes buldged out and mouth dropped open. I swear first time in my life that actually had such a big reaction.
I know right. I find out how they do it when I was next in line. I turned and watched then cut the girl in front of me.was not at all expecting that
